scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And so I wish'd thy body might my heart:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And even with this I lost fair England's view
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And bid mine eyes be packing with my heart
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And call'd them blind and dusky spectacles,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For losing ken of Albion's wished coast.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: How often have I tempted Suffolk's tongue,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: The agent of thy foul inconstancy,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To sit and witch me, as Ascanius did
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: When he to madding Dido would unfold
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: His father's acts commenced in burning Troy!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Am I not witch'd like her? or thou not false like him?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Ay me, I can no more! die, Margaret!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For Henry weeps that thou dost live so long.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: It is reported, mighty sovereign,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That good Duke Humphrey traitorously is murder'd
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: By Suffolk and the Cardinal Beaufort's means.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: The commons, like an angry hive of bees
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That want their leader, scatter up and down
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And care not who they sting in his revenge.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Myself have calm'd their spleenful mutiny,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Until they hear the order of his death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That he is dead, good Warwick, 'tis too true;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But how he died God knows, not Henry:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Enter his chamber, view his breathless corpse,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And comment then upon his sudden death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That shall I do, my liege. Stay, Salisbury,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: With the rude multitude till I return.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: O Thou that judgest all things, stay my thoughts,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: My thoughts, that labour to persuade my soul
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Some violent hands were laid on Humphrey's life!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: If my suspect be false, forgive me, God,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For judgment only doth belong to thee.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Fain would I go to chafe his paly lips
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: With twenty thousand kisses, and to drain
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Upon his face an ocean of salt tears,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To tell my love unto his dumb deaf trunk,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And with my fingers feel his hand unfeeling:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But all in vain are these mean obsequies;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And to survey his dead and earthly image,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: What were it but to make my sorrow greater?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Come hither, gracious sovereign, view this body.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That is to see how deep my grave is made;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For with his soul fled all my worldly solace,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For seeing him I see my life in death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: As surely as my soul intends to live
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: With that dread King that took our state upon him
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To free us from his father's wrathful curse,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I do believe that violent hands were laid
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Upon the life of this thrice-famed duke.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: A dreadful oath, sworn with a solemn tongue!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: What instance gives Lord Warwick for his vow?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: See how the blood is settled in his face.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Oft have I seen a timely-parted ghost,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Of ashy semblance, meagre, pale and bloodless,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Being all descended to the labouring heart;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Who, in the conflict that it holds with death,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Attracts the same for aidance 'gainst the enemy;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Which with the heart there cools and ne'er returneth
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To blush and beautify the cheek again.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But see, his face is black and full of blood,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: His eye-balls further out than when he lived,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Staring full ghastly like a strangled man;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: His hair uprear'd, his nostrils stretched with struggling;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: His hands abroad display'd, as one that grasp'd
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And tugg'd for life and was by strength subdued:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Look, on the sheets his hair you see, is sticking;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: His well-proportion'd beard made rough and rugged,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Like to the summer's corn by tempest lodged.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: It cannot be but he was murder'd here;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: The least of all these signs were probable.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Why, Warwick, who should do the duke to death?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Myself and Beaufort had him in protection;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And we, I hope, sir, are no murderers.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But both of you were vow'd Duke Humphrey's foes,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And you, forsooth, had the good duke to keep:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: 'Tis like you would not feast him like a friend;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And 'tis well seen he found an enemy.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Then you, belike, suspect these noblemen
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: As guilty of Duke Humphrey's timeless death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Who finds the heifer dead and bleeding fresh
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And sees fast by a butcher with an axe,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But will suspect 'twas he that made the slaughter?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Who finds the partridge in the puttock's nest,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But may imagine how the bird was dead,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Although the kite soar with unbloodied beak?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Even so suspicious is this tragedy.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Are you the butcher, Suffolk? Where's your knife?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Is Beaufort term'd a kite? Where are his talons?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I wear no knife to slaughter sleeping men;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But here's a vengeful sword, rusted with ease,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That shall be scoured in his rancorous heart
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That slanders me with murder's crimson badge.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Say, if thou darest, proud Lord of Warwick-shire,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That I am faulty in Duke Humphrey's death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: What dares not Warwick, if false Suffolk dare him?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: He dares not calm his contumelious spirit
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Nor cease to be an arrogant controller,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Though Suffolk dare him twenty thousand times.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Madam, be still; with reverence may I say;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For every word you speak in his behalf
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Is slander to your royal dignity.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Blunt-witted lord, ignoble in demeanor!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: If ever lady wrong'd her lord so much,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Thy mother took into her blameful bed
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Some stern untutor'd churl, and noble stock
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Was graft with crab-tree slip; whose fruit thou art,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And never of the Nevils' noble race.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But that the guilt of murder bucklers thee
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And I should rob the deathsman of his fee,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Quitting thee thereby of ten thousand shames,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And that my sovereign's presence makes me mild,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I would, false murderous coward, on thy knee
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Make thee beg pardon for thy passed speech,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And say it was thy mother that thou meant'st
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That thou thyself was born in bastardy;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And after all this fearful homage done,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Give thee thy hire and send thy soul to hell,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Pernicious blood-sucker of sleeping men!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Thou shall be waking well I shed thy blood,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: If from this presence thou darest go with me.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Away even now, or I will drag thee hence:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Unworthy though thou art, I'll cope with thee
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And do some service to Duke Humphrey's ghost.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: What stronger breastplate than a heart untainted!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Thrice is he armed that hath his quarrel just,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And he but naked, though lock'd up in steel
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Whose conscience with injustice is corrupted.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: What noise is this?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Why, how now, lords! your wrathful weapons drawn
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Here in our presence! dare you be so bold?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Why, what tumultuous clamour have we here?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: The traitorous Warwick with the men of Bury
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Set all upon me, mighty sovereign.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: the king shall know your mind.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Dread lord, the commons send you word by me,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Unless Lord Suffolk straight be done to death,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Or banished fair England's territories,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: They will by violence tear him from your palace
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And torture him with grievous lingering death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: They say, by him the good Duke Humphrey died;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: They say, in him they fear your highness' death;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And mere instinct of love and loyalty,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Free from a stubborn opposite intent,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: As being thought to contradict your liking,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Makes them thus forward in his banishment.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: They say, in care of your most royal person,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That if your highness should intend to sleep
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And charge that no man should disturb your rest
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: In pain of your dislike or pain of death,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Yet, notwithstanding such a strait edict,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Were there a serpent seen, with forked tongue,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That slily glided towards your majesty,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: It were but necessary you were waked,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Lest, being suffer'd in that harmful slumber,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: The mortal worm might make the sleep eternal;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And therefore do they cry, though you forbid,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That they will guard you, whether you will or no,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: From such fell serpents as false Suffolk is,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: With whose envenomed and fatal sting,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Your loving uncle, twenty times his worth,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: They say, is shamefully bereft of life.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Lord of Salisbury!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: 'Tis like the commons, rude unpolish'd hinds,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Could send such message to their sovereign:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But you, my lord, were glad to be employ'd,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To show how quaint an orator you are:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But all the honour Salisbury hath won
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Is, that he was the lord ambassador
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Sent from a sort of tinkers to the king.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Go, Salisbury, and tell them all from me.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I thank them for their tender loving care;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And had I not been cited so by them,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Yet did I purpose as they do entreat;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For, sure, my thoughts do hourly prophesy
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Mischance unto my state by Suffolk's means:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And therefore, by His majesty I swear,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Whose far unworthy deputy I am,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: He shall not breathe infection in this air
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But three days longer, on the pain of death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: O Henry, let me plead for gentle Suffolk!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Ungentle queen, to call him gentle Suffolk!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: No more, I say: if thou dost plead for him,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Thou wilt but add increase unto my wrath.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Had I but said, I would have kept my word,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But when I swear, it is irrevocable.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: If, after three days' space, thou here be'st found
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: On any ground that I am ruler of,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: The world shall not be ransom for thy life.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Come, Warwick, come, good Warwick, go with me;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I have great matters to impart to thee.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Mischance and sorrow go along with you!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Heart's discontent and sour affliction
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Be playfellows to keep you company!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: There's two of you; the devil make a third!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And threefold vengeance tend upon your steps!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Cease, gentle queen, these execrations,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And let thy Suffolk take his heavy leave.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Fie, coward woman and soft-hearted wretch!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Hast thou not spirit to curse thine enemy?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: A plague upon them! wherefore should I curse them?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Would curses kill, as doth the mandrake's groan,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I would invent as bitter-searching terms,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: As curst, as harsh and horrible to hear,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Deliver'd strongly through my fixed teeth,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: With full as many signs of deadly hate,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: As lean-faced Envy in her loathsome cave:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: My tongue should stumble in mine earnest words;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Mine eyes should sparkle like the beaten flint;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Mine hair be fixed on end, as one distract;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Ay, every joint should seem to curse and ban:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And even now my burthen'd heart would break,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Should I not curse them. Poison be their drink!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Gall, worse than gall, the daintiest that they taste!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Their sweetest shade a grove of cypress trees!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Their chiefest prospect murdering basilisks!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Their softest touch as smart as lizards' sting!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Their music frightful as the serpent's hiss,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And boding screech-owls make the concert full!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: All the foul terrors in dark-seated hell--
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Enough, sweet Suffolk; thou torment'st thyself;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And these dread curses, like the sun 'gainst glass,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Or like an overcharged gun, recoil,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And turn the force of them upon thyself.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: You bade me ban, and will you bid me leave?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Now, by the ground that I am banish'd from,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Well could I curse away a winter's night,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Though standing naked on a mountain top,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Where biting cold would never let grass grow,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And think it but a minute spent in sport.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: O, let me entreat thee cease. Give me thy hand,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That I may dew it with my mournful tears;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Nor let the rain of heaven wet this place,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To wash away my woful monuments.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: O, could this kiss be printed in thy hand,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That thou mightst think upon these by the seal,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Through whom a thousand sighs are breathed for thee!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: So, get thee gone, that I may know my grief;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: 'Tis but surmised whiles thou art standing by,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: As one that surfeits thinking on a want.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I will repeal thee, or, be well assured,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Adventure to be banished myself:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And banished I am, if but from thee.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Go; speak not to me; even now be gone.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: O, go not yet! Even thus two friends condemn'd
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Embrace and kiss and take ten thousand leaves,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Loather a hundred times to part than die.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Yet now farewell; and farewell life with thee!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Thus is poor Suffolk ten times banished;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Once by the king, and three times thrice by thee.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: 'Tis not the land I care for, wert thou thence;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: A wilderness is populous enough,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: So Suffolk had thy heavenly company:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For where thou art, there is the world itself,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: With every several pleasure in the world,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And where thou art not, desolation.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I can no more: live thou to joy thy life;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Myself no joy in nought but that thou livest.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Wither goes Vaux so fast? what news, I prithee?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To signify unto his majesty
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That Cardinal Beaufort is at point of death;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For suddenly a grievous sickness took him,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That makes him gasp and stare and catch the air,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Blaspheming God and cursing men on earth.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Sometimes he talks as if Duke Humphrey's ghost
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Were by his side; sometime he calls the king,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And whispers to his pillow, as to him,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: The secrets of his overcharged soul;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And I am sent to tell his majesty
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That even now he cries aloud for him.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Go tell this heavy message to the king.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Ay me! what is this world! what news are these!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But wherefore grieve I at an hour's poor loss,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Omitting Suffolk's exile, my soul's treasure?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Why only, Suffolk, mourn I not for thee,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And with the southern clouds contend in tears,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Theirs for the earth's increase, mine for my sorrows?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Now get thee hence: the king, thou know'st, is coming;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: If thou be found by me, thou art but dead.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: If I depart from thee, I cannot live;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And in thy sight to die, what were it else
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: But like a pleasant slumber in thy lap?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Here could I breathe my soul into the air,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: As mild and gentle as the cradle-babe
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Dying with mother's dug between its lips:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Where, from thy sight, I should be raging mad,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And cry out for thee to close up mine eyes,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To have thee with thy lips to stop my mouth;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: So shouldst thou either turn my flying soul,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Or I should breathe it so into thy body,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And then it lived in sweet Elysium.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To die by thee were but to die in jest;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: From thee to die were torture more than death:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: O, let me stay, befall what may befall!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Away! though parting be a fretful corrosive,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: It is applied to a deathful wound.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: To France, sweet Suffolk: let me hear from thee;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: For wheresoe'er thou art in this world's globe,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I'll have an Iris that shall find thee out.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: I go.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: And take my heart with thee.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: A jewel, lock'd into the wofull'st cask
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: That ever did contain a thing of worth.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: Even as a splitted bark, so sunder we
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: This way fall I to death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: This way for me.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE II.  Bury St. Edmund's. A room of state.

line_text: How fares my lord? speak, Beaufort, to
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: thy sovereign.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: If thou be'st death, I'll give thee England's treasure,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Enough to purchase such another island,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So thou wilt let me live, and feel no pain.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Ah, what a sign it is of evil life,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Where death's approach is seen so terrible!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Beaufort, it is thy sovereign speaks to thee.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Bring me unto my trial when you will.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Died he not in his bed? where should he die?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Can I make men live, whether they will or no?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, torture me no more! I will confess.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Alive again? then show me where he is:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: I'll give a thousand pound to look upon him.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: He hath no eyes, the dust hath blinded them.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Comb down his hair; look, look! it stands upright,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Like lime-twigs set to catch my winged soul.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Give me some drink; and bid the apothecary
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Bring the strong poison that I bought of him.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O thou eternal Mover of the heavens.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Look with a gentle eye upon this wretch!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: O, beat away the busy meddling fiend
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: That lays strong siege unto this wretch's soul.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And from his bosom purge this black despair!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: See, how the pangs of death do make him grin!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Disturb him not; let him pass peaceably.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Peace to his soul, if God's good pleasure be!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Lord cardinal, if thou think'st on heaven's bliss,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Hold up thy hand, make signal of thy hope.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: He dies, and makes no sign. O God, forgive him!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: So bad a death argues a monstrous life.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Forbear to judge, for we are sinners all.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: Close up his eyes and draw the curtain close;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: And let us all to meditation.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth

line_text: The gaudy, blabbing and remorseful day
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Is crept into the bosom of the sea;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And now loud-howling wolves arouse the jades
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: That drag the tragic melancholy night;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Who, with their drowsy, slow and flagging wings,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Clip dead men's graves and from their misty jaws
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Breathe foul contagious darkness in the air.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Therefore bring forth the soldiers of our prize;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: For, whilst our pinnace anchors in the Downs,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Here shall they make their ransom on the sand,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Or with their blood stain this discolour'd shore.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Master, this prisoner freely give I thee;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And thou that art his mate, make boot of this;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: The other, Walter Whitmore, is thy share.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: What is my ransom, master? let me know.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: A thousand crowns, or else lay down your head.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And so much shall you give, or off goes yours.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: What, think you much to pay two thousand crowns,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And bear the name and port of gentlemen?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Cut both the villains' throats; for die you shall:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: The lives of those which we have lost in fight
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Be counterpoised with such a petty sum!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: I'll give it, sir; and therefore spare my life.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And so will I and write home for it straight.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: I lost mine eye in laying the prize aboard,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And therefore to revenge it, shalt thou die;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And so should these, if I might have my will.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Be not so rash; take ransom, let him live.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Look on my George; I am a gentleman:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Rate me at what thou wilt, thou shalt be paid.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And so am I; my name is Walter Whitmore.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: How now! why start'st thou? what, doth
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: death affright?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Thy name affrights me, in whose sound is death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: A cunning man did calculate my birth
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And told me that by water I should die:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Yet let not this make thee be bloody-minded;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Thy name is Gaultier, being rightly sounded.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Gaultier or Walter, which it is, I care not:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Never yet did base dishonour blur our name,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: But with our sword we wiped away the blot;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Therefore, when merchant-like I sell revenge,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Broke be my sword, my arms torn and defaced,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And I proclaim'd a coward through the world!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Stay, Whitmore; for thy prisoner is a prince,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: The Duke of Suffolk, William de la Pole.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: The Duke of Suffolk muffled up in rags!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Ay, but these rags are no part of the duke:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Jove sometimes went disguised, and why not I?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: But Jove was never slain, as thou shalt be.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Obscure and lowly swain, King Henry's blood,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: The honourable blood of Lancaster,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Must not be shed by such a jaded groom.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Hast thou not kiss'd thy hand and held my stirrup?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Bare-headed plodded by my foot-cloth mule
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And thought thee happy when I shook my head?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: How often hast thou waited at my cup,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Fed from my trencher, kneel'd down at the board.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: When I have feasted with Queen Margaret?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Remember it and let it make thee crest-fall'n,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Ay, and allay this thy abortive pride;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: How in our voiding lobby hast thou stood
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And duly waited for my coming forth?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: This hand of mine hath writ in thy behalf,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And therefore shall it charm thy riotous tongue.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Speak, captain, shall I stab the forlorn swain?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: First let my words stab him, as he hath me.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Base slave, thy words are blunt and so art thou.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Convey him hence and on our longboat's side
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Strike off his head.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Thou darest not, for thy own.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Yes, Pole.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Pole!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Pool! Sir Pool! lord!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Ay, kennel, puddle, sink; whose filth and dirt
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Troubles the silver spring where England drinks.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Now will I dam up this thy yawning mouth
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: For swallowing the treasure of the realm:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Thy lips that kiss'd the queen shall sweep the ground;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And thou that smiledst at good Duke Humphrey's death,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Against the senseless winds shalt grin in vain,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Who in contempt shall hiss at thee again:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And wedded be thou to the hags of hell,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: For daring to affy a mighty lord
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Unto the daughter of a worthless king,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Having neither subject, wealth, nor diadem.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: By devilish policy art thou grown great,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And, like ambitious Sylla, overgorged
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: With gobbets of thy mother's bleeding heart.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: By thee Anjou and Maine were sold to France,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: The false revolting Normans thorough thee
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Disdain to call us lord, and Picardy
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Hath slain their governors, surprised our forts,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And sent the ragged soldiers wounded home.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: The princely Warwick, and the Nevils all,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Whose dreadful swords were never drawn in vain,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: As hating thee, are rising up in arms:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And now the house of York, thrust from the crown
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: By shameful murder of a guiltless king
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And lofty proud encroaching tyranny,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Burns with revenging fire; whose hopeful colours
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Advance our half-faced sun, striving to shine,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Under the which is writ 'Invitis nubibus.'
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: The commons here in Kent are up in arms:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And, to conclude, reproach and beggary
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Is crept into the palace of our king.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And all by thee. Away! convey him hence.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: O that I were a god, to shoot forth thunder
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Upon these paltry, servile, abject drudges!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Small things make base men proud: this villain here,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Being captain of a pinnace, threatens more
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Than Bargulus the strong Illyrian pirate.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Drones suck not eagles' blood but rob beehives:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: It is impossible that I should die
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: By such a lowly vassal as thyself.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Thy words move rage and not remorse in me:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: I go of message from the queen to France;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: I charge thee waft me safely cross the Channel.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Walter,--
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Come, Suffolk, I must waft thee to thy death.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Gelidus timor occupat artus it is thee I fear.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Thou shalt have cause to fear before I leave thee.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: What, are ye daunted now? now will ye stoop?
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: My gracious lord, entreat him, speak him fair.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Suffolk's imperial tongue is stern and rough,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Used to command, untaught to plead for favour.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Far be it we should honour such as these
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: With humble suit: no, rather let my head
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Stoop to the block than these knees bow to any
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Save to the God of heaven and to my king;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And sooner dance upon a bloody pole
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Than stand uncover'd to the vulgar groom.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: True nobility is exempt from fear:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: More can I bear than you dare execute.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Hale him away, and let him talk no more.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Come, soldiers, show what cruelty ye can,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: That this my death may never be forgot!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Great men oft die by vile bezonians:
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: A Roman sworder and banditto slave
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Murder'd sweet Tully; Brutus' bastard hand
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Stabb'd Julius Caesar; savage islanders
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Pompey the Great; and Suffolk dies by pirates.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: And as for these whose ransom we have set,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: It is our pleasure one of them depart;
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Therefore come you with us and let him go.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: There let his head and lifeless body lie,
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: Until the queen his mistress bury it.
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: O barbarous and bloody spectacle!
play_title_long: The Second Part of Henry the Sixth
scene_title: SCENE I.  The coast of Kent.

line_text: His body will I bear unto the king:
